response.body:
{
    "meta": {
        "title": "Asharam Management",
        "description": "",
        "configCaches": true,
        "copyright_text": "Asharam Management",
        "login_logo": "/assets/ashma/logo.png",
        "sidebar_icon": null,
        "default_auth": "login_with_email_otp",
        "profile": {
            "url": "/dashboard/profile",
            "entity": "/api/profile/",
            "label": "Profile",
            "template": "profile-template-one"
        },
        "sidebar": {
            "logo": "/assets/ashma/logo-icon.png",
            "title": "Clock In",
            "isTitleHide": true
        },
        "favicon": "/assets/ashma/favicon.ico"
    },
    "header": {
        "template": "header-style-one",
        "entity": "/dashboard/management",
        "caches": false
    },
    "footer": {
        "template": "footer-style-one",
        "entity": "/dashboard/management",
        "caches": false
    },
    "adminMenu": [
        {
            "template": "document-upload-template",
            "label": "Configuration Upload",
            "url": "/dashboard/google-config-upload",
            "entity": "/api/google/upload/files/",
            "icon": "page",
            "id": "configuration_upload",
            "caches": false,
            "key": "google-config-upload",
            "order": 2
        },
        {
            "template": "dashboard-generic-grid",
            "label": "Users Registration",
            "url": "/dashboard/user/registration",
            "entity": "/auth/user/registration/",
            "icon": "UserPlus",
            "id": "users_registration",
            "caches": false,
            "key": "registration",
            "order": 5
        },
        {
            "template": "dashboard-generic-grid",
            "label": "Roles",
            "url": "/dashboard/roles",
            "entity": "/api/roles/",
            "icon": "UserCog",
            "id": "roles",
            "caches": false,
            "key": "roles",
            "order": 6
        },
        {
            "template": "dashboard-generic-grid",
            "label": "Role To User Mapping",
            "url": "/dashboard/role-to-user-mapping",
            "entity": "/api/role-to-user-mapping/",
            "icon": "GitBranch",
            "id": "role_to_user_mapping",
            "caches": false,
            "key": "role-to-user-mapping",
            "order": 7
        },
        {
            "template": "dashboard-generic-grid",
            "label": "Entity",
            "url": "/dashboard/entity",
            "entity": "/api/entity/",
            "icon": "Box",
            "id": "entity",
            "caches": false,
            "key": "entity",
            "order": 8
        },
        {
            "template": "dashboard-generic-grid",
            "label": "Excel Management",
            "url": "/dashboard/management",
            "entity": "/api/google/excel_sheet/",
            "icon": "Table",
            "id": "excel_management",
            "caches": false,
            "key": "excel_management",
            "order": 12
        },
        {
            "template": "dashboard-generic-grid",
            "label": "Logs",
            "url": "/dashboard/logs",
            "entity": "/api/logs/",
            "icon": "FileText",
            "id": "logs",
            "caches": false,
            "key": "logs",
            "order": 15
        },
        {
            "template": "dashboard-generic-grid",
            "label": "Role Permission",
            "url": "/dashboard/access-control",
            "entity": "/api/access-control/",
            "icon": "UserRoundCog",
            "id": "role_permission",
            "caches": false,
            "key": null,
            "order": 16
        },
        {
            "template": "dashboard-generic-grid",
            "label": "Calendar",
            "url": "/dashboard/calendar",
            "entity": "/dashboard/calendar",
            "icon": "CalendarDays",
            "id": "/api/calendar",
            "caches": true,
            "key": "calendar-days",
            "order": 30
        }
    ],
    "siteMenu": [
        {
            "template": "coming-soon",
            "label": "Home",
            "url": "/",
            "entity": "/api/home/",
            "icon": "page",
            "id": "excel_sheet",
            "caches": true,
            "local": true,
            "key": "excel_sheet"
        }
    ],
    "authMenu": {
        "login_with_email": [
            {
                "template": "login-template-one",
                "label": "Sign in",
                "url": "/auth/login",
                "entity": "/noauth/api/login-via-email/password/",
                "id": "login-email-password",
                "keepToken": true,
                "caches": true
            }
        ],
        "login_with_email_otp": [
            {
                "template": "login-template-one",
                "label": "Sign in",
                "url": "/auth/login-with-email-otp",
                "entity": "/noauth/api/login-via-email/",
                "id": "login-email",
                "caches": true,
                "nextPage": "/auth/login/verify-otp",
                "param": "email"
            },
            {
                "template": "login-template-one",
                "label": "Sign in",
                "url": "/auth/login/verify-otp",
                "entity": "/noauth/api/verify-otp/",
                "id": "login-email-verify-otp",
                "keepToken": true,
                "caches": true,
                "prevParam": "email"
            }
        ],
        "login_with_mobile_otp": [],
        "reset_password": [
            {
                "template": "login-template-one",
                "label": "Reset Password",
                "url": "/auth/forgot-password-email",
                "entity": "/noauth/api/reset/password/email/",
                "id": "reset-email-password",
                "caches": true,
                "nextPage": "/auth/reset-email-otp-password",
                "param": "email"
            },
            {
                "template": "login-template-one",
                "label": "Sign in",
                "url": "/auth/reset-email-otp-password",
                "entity": "/noauth/api/reset/password/email/otp/",
                "id": "reset-email-password-otp",
                "keepToken": true,
                "caches": true,
                "prevParam": "email"
            }
        ]
    }
}
